fields.title: Fatty fish for brain health
fields.tip_text: Eating salmon or mackerel twice a week can boost vitamin D levels.
fields.expanded_text: Vitamin D from fatty fish supports cognitive function and may lower risk of dementia.

fields.title: Mushrooms as a vegan source
fields.tip_text: Mushrooms exposed to UV light provide plant-based vitamin D.
fields.expanded_text: They help vegans maintain healthy vitamin D intake for bone and brain health.
